At the end of the crawl I always have a lot URI queues snoozed and it takes=
 years to finish

I don't understand because I have the following settings =
in my BdbFrontier : 

 <bean id=3D"frontier" 
   class=3D"org.archive.crawl=
er.frontier.BdbFrontier">

        <property name=3D"snoozeLongMs" value=3D=
"300000" />
        <property name=3D"retryDelaySeconds" value=3D"1" />
   =
     <property name=3D"maxRetries" value=3D"3" />

So it should give up rea=
lly quickly but that's not the case, I always have one/two hundreds of URI =
queues who takes years to finish (after having crawled approximatly 60 753 =
URI queues)...
